channel.title: Who we are on CoderPush
channel.description: Recent content in Who we are on CoderPush

item.title: Why CoderPush!
item.description: Why join a young company instead of a big one? Because you can learn faster, make mistakes, share learning from mistakes, and have a personal impact on those around you. You shape how the company forms. Why a software studio instead of a product company? It’s like spending a few years at a training camp, for something that you love doing :) There should be more companies like ours in Vietnam, even South East Asia, but we don’t know many.
